CustomField.formula:
IF( /* - - - - - - - - - - New Business - - - - - - - - - - */ CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), "New Business"),
IF( Opportunity_Competitor_Counter__c > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO")),"N/A" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Enter Competitors current vendor in use
CustomField.label: Check Current Vendor (Competitor)
